BODY.title: Raw GitHub URL contract for Web.run bootstrapping

value.step1: Fetch manifests/latest.json from raw_base; parse items sorted newest-first.
value.step2: Fetch top N delta paths from raw_base + '/' + item.path (N default 25).
value.step3: Verify sha256/bytes when possible; if mismatch, fall back to ledger scan for that sha.
value.step4: Integrate via AutoDeltaReconciler; do not require manual uploads.

chat_checks: User pastes the raw URL(s) into chat so web.run can open them (tool constraint).

notes.why: Locks the exact URL pattern and bootstrap algorithm so any fresh chat can self-mount without user uploads.
notes.tooling_constraint: In this environment, web.run can only open URLs that appear in the chat or search results; therefore the user should paste the raw URLs once to allow verification.
